iata:packingListID.description: Packing list number assigned by the Supplier or the buyer to the Packing list

iata:packingListDate.description: The date/time stamp at which the Packing list (message) was created. Format: YYYYMMDDTHH:MM:SS

iata:packingListHeadNote.description: Contains a message level text note. Free text

iata:packingListWeightUnitCode.description: weight unit code for the invoice

iata:packingListDimensionsUnitCode.description: dimensions unit code for the invoice

iata:packingListVolumeUnitCode.description: volume unit code for the invoice

iata:packingListSummaryNote.description: Contains a summary level text note. Free text
